title: internal compiler error: tempname not during code generation
body:
by **hectorchu**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

package main

func main() {
	var a [1e9]int
	a[0] = 0
}

2. What is the full compiler output?
On 8g version weekly.2011-07-29 9343:
test.go:5: internal compiler error: tempname not during code generation

On golang.org:
prog.go:5: internal compiler error: bad width

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
8g version weekly.2011-07-29 9343
